name: Flappy Smash: The Bird Hunting - Best Quick Arcade Game for Time Killing to The Fun of Whole Family
name_original: Flappy Smash: The Bird Hunting - Best Quick Arcade Game for Time Killing to The Fun of Whole Family
description:
Are you tired of so many birds and bird-like figures to flappy around? They time is over! Now you can kill them in this fast paced action game. You see a creature, that flappies, Smash it! Something tries to move between two columns? Kill it fast! Just heard some distant flapping sound? Don't hesitate, act fast, take your time, aim and use your best killing tap in the real anti-flappy action game. The quest is reversed - THEY flap, you kill them not to go far...
Be fast, be cruel killing them all!

FEATURES
- Fast Arcade Action
- Very simple and casual controls
- Endless gameplay, endless objects to kill.
- Be the nightmare of the flappy objects
- Destruction was never so addictive before
- This is time for your revenge against some birds stealing your time flapping around

For more information please visit our website: www.pocketscientists.com
